# The `DebugHandlerBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Base class for debug information backends.

Common functionality related to tracking which variables and scopes are alive at a given PC live here.

Definition at line 53 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### beginBasicBlockSection() {#ab11ae5ad7e5425363269b222cf113f40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DebugHandlerBase::beginBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the beginning of a new basic-block-section within a function.

Always called immediately after beginFunction for the first basic-block. When basic-block-sections are enabled, called before the first block of each such section.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp/#l00424">424</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp">DebugHandlerBase.cpp</a>.

### endBasicBlockSection() {#a40e11974dc6a4adcf263f0dce1e0c5c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DebugHandlerBase::endBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the end of a basic-block-section within a function.

When basic-block-sections are enabled, called after the last block in each such section (including the last section in the function). When basic-block-sections are disabled, called at the end of a function, immediately prior to markFunctionEnd.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp/#l00430">430</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp">DebugHandlerBase.cpp</a>.

  labels = {["protected"]}>
Previous instruction&#39;s location information.

This is used to determine label location to indicate scope boundaries in debug info. We track the previous instruction&#39;s source location (if not line 0), whether it was a label, and its parent BB.
